data.text:
When Julia Lemigova is now not starring on 'The Real Housewives of Miami,' she is proud mother â meet her daughters, Emma and Victoria.

If you might be a fan of The Real Housewives of Miami, then it's most likely that you're within the process of getting acquainted with one of its most up-to-date additions: Julia Lemigova.

The former fashion is set to make fairly a big splash within the town of palms, and her addition to the forged is a refreshing first as she is one of the one openly homosexual solid individuals in Real Housewives history.

With all of that being stated, what precisely do we find out about Julia's private existence and how her role on Real Housewives of Miami pertains to all of it? Keep studying for main points on her youngsters, wife, and more!

Julia is the proud mother to a few kids.

The fact star is certainly a proud mother and has been open about being one on masses of occasions in the past. Back in 1997, Julia was romantically involved with a banker named Ãdouard Stern. The duo gave beginning to 1 child in combination, a son named Maximilien.

However, Maximilien's life was cut tragically short when he died under mysterious instances as an toddler. His actual purpose of demise has no longer been officially revealed, on the other hand, in line with The US Sun, a hid autopsy record prompt the baby had lines of diazepam, a robust medication which is typically used to treat seizures, was discovered in the baby's bloodstream. A police investigation and the possible involvement of a nanny, who vanished in a while after he died, according to Daily Mail.

Outside of that tragic circumstance, Julia is additionally the dad or mum to two daughters from two other relationships â daughters Victoria and Emma.

Julia discussed adopting a kid with wife Martina Navratilova.

Julia's wife is tennis legend, Martina Navratilova. The duo dated for somewhat some time ahead of Martina decided to pop the question to Julia on Sept. 6, 2014, on the U.S. Open.

The glad couple was officially married in New York on Dec. 15, 2014.

On RHOM, Julia and Martina started the method of adopting a kid, but they had to put their plans on dangle after Martina was once recognized with Stage 1 throat cancer and early-stage breast cancer.

"When you're adopting a child, it has to be about the child," Julia shared on the RHOM Season Five reunion. "And, right now, it's everything about Martina, and for her [to be] getting healthy."

She continued, "So, we're putting it on hold. You know, we were thinking [that at] any moment, the agency would call and give us happy news that we're going to have a baby... Instead, we are fighting two cancers. Like one was not enough."

Fortunately, in March 2023, Martina announced she used to be cancer-free and playing her time along with her wife, and their puppy goat.

Watch The Real Housewives of Miami on Wednesdays at 9 p.m. EST on Bravo and Peacock.
